survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Home Smart Gardening Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and usage patterns of smart gardening systems designed for home use, focusing on ease of use, effectiveness, and desired improvements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart gardening system overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with vertical alignment.
